name: video-puzzle
description: A puzzle game using the webcam

scripts.clean: rimraf build && mkdirp build && mkdirp build/js && mkdirp build/css
scripts.copy: cpy 'src/index.html' build && cpy 'src/css/main.css' build/css && cpy 'src/meta/*.*' build/meta && cpy 'src/favicon.ico' build && cpy 'src/manifest.json' build
scripts.build: npm run jshint && npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run browserify
